TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EncryptionMethod extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Encapsulates the encryption algorithm used for XML encryption.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The `<EncryptionMethod>` tag uses a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) to identify the encryption algorithm that must be used to decrypt XML data. The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod> class encapsulates the `<EncryptionMethod>` tag defined by the World Wide Web Consortium XML Encryption specification located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/.
Use the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod> class to identify the encryption algorithm associated with the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> element or the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> element.
Use one of the URI identifiers defined by the World Wide Web Consortium XML Encryption specification located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/. All URI identifiers are accessible as static fields of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> class.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple utility class that uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES> algorithm to encrypt an XML document.
[!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.MainXMLEncDecryptDataOOP#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.MainXMLEncDecryptDataOOP/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.MainXMLEncDecryptDataOOP#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.MainXMLEncDecryptDataOOP/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.MainXMLEncDecryptDataOOP#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.MainXMLEncDecryptDataOOP/VB/sample.vb#1)]
The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using a symmetric key. This example does not include any key information in the encrypted XML document.
[!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData/CPP/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData/VB/sample.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks This constructor initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod> class without specifying the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of an encryption algorithm.

Docs.param: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the algorithm represented by an instance of the class.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class specifying an algorithm Uniform Resource Identifier (URI).

remarks.format:
## Remarks This constructor initializes a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod> class using the URI of an encryption algorithm.
Use one of the URI identifiers defined by the World Wide Web Consortium XML Encryption specification located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/. All URI identifiers are accessible as static fields of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> class.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates how to create a simple utility class that uses the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.TripleDES> algorithm to encrypt an XML document.
[!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.MainXMLEncDecryptDataOOP#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.MainXMLEncDecryptDataOOP/CPP/sample.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.MainXMLEncDecryptDataOOP#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.MainXMLEncDecryptDataOOP/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.MainXMLEncDecryptDataOOP#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.MainXMLEncDecryptDataOOP/VB/sample.vb#1)]
The following code example demonstrates how to encrypt an XML document using a symmetric key. This example does not include any key information in the encrypted XML document.
[!code-cpp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData/CPP/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData/CS/sample.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Cryptography.XML.XMLEncMinimalDecryptData/VB/sample.vb#1)]

Docs.summary: Returns an object that encapsulates an instance of the class.
Docs.returns: An object that encapsulates an instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod.GetXml%2A> method returns a representation of the `<EncryptionMethod>` element.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ KeyAlgorithm { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };
member this.KeyAlgorithm : string with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the algorithm to use for XML encryption.
Docs.value: A Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the algorithm to use for XML encryption.

remarks.format:
## Remarks The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod.KeyAlgorithm%2A> property describes the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) of the encryption algorithm used to encrypt data associated with either the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> element or the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> element.
Use one of the URI identifiers defined by the World Wide Web Consortium XML Encryption specification located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xmlenc-core/. All URI identifiers are accessible as static fields of the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedXml> class.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int KeySize { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.KeySize : int with get, set

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the algorithm key size used for XML encryption.
Docs.value: The algorithm key size, in bits, used for XML encryption.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod.KeySize%2A> property describes the key size of the encryption algorithm used to encrypt data associated with either the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedData> element or the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptedKey> element.

Docs.exception: The property was set to a value that was less than 0.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void LoadXml(class System.Xml.XmlElement value) cil managed

Docs.summary: Parses the specified object and configures the internal state of the object to match.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod.LoadXml%2A> method configures the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.EncryptionMethod> object to match the state of an <xref:System.Xml.XmlElement> object.

Docs.exception: The key size expressed in the value parameter was less than 0.
